intents.description: Determine the primary strength adaptation the plan must target (max force, power, hypertrophy) so sessions emphasize the right methods.

experience_modifiers.beginner: Anchor the question in developing fundamental strength without overwhelming with technical language.
experience_modifiers.intermediate: Connect the desired outcome to current training emphasis or performance markers.
experience_modifiers.advanced: Surface precise outcome nuances that influence periodization or competition prep.

applicability_conditions: Always relevant for strength-focused goals regardless of secondary focuses.

intents.description: Identify movement patterns or body regions that need focused development so exercise selection and volume target those areas.

experience_modifiers.beginner: Frame movement categories simply (full-body vs lower-body) with minimal jargon.
experience_modifiers.intermediate: Encourage specificity around stubborn lifts or movement classes.
experience_modifiers.advanced: Invite references to specialized movement patterns that influence programming micro-cycles.

applicability_conditions: Prioritize when the goal references imbalances, physique goals, or lift-specific targets.

intents.description: Surface sticking points or plateaus that require programming adjustments (e.g., stalled squat, deadlift lockout weaknesses).

experience_modifiers.beginner: Explore general obstacles like inconsistency or form breakdown.
experience_modifiers.intermediate: Target plateaus tied to specific lifts or rep ranges.
experience_modifiers.advanced: Probe for precise mechanical or recovery-related limiters.

applicability_conditions: Use when user history mentions stalled progress or frustration.
Skip if the goal is purely exploratory without prior strength training.

intents.description: Gauge confidence with key lift variations so the plan assigns movements the athlete can execute safely and effectively.

experience_modifiers.beginner: Confirm comfort with foundational patterns and bodyweight progressions.
experience_modifiers.intermediate: Assess readiness for more complex variations or loading strategies.
experience_modifiers.advanced: Clarify appetite for high-skill variations that demand technical mastery.

applicability_conditions: Apply when introducing new variations or when goal implies technical refinement.
